creator: giuru@giuru.ch
text:
If the browsers user-agent contains "rm" as language code ("rm" is the language code of Romansh language according to ISO 639.2) as in the romansh version of Firefox (mozilla.com/rm) some apache webservers return just:
"501 Method Not Implemented 
GET to / not supported."

Examples: 
Error with user-agent "Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; Intel Mac OS X 10.5; rm; rv:1.9.2.3) Gecko/20100401 Firefox/3.6.3" on following sites:

http://www.zuerich.ch/
http://www.urbanmag.be/
http://www.kde.de
http://www.college.ch
http://www.xio.be/
http://www.flagey.be/fr
http://www.investinghent.be/
http://www.breadcrumbs.be/
http://www.act-events.com/
http://www.balkmetafoor.be/
http://www.hooglede.be/
http://www.georgesthemailman.com/
http://www.herenigdevolksunie.be/
http://www.jozeflievens.be/
http://www.islamischereligionsgemeinschaft.org/
http://www.eurid.eu/
http://www.cron-job.org/
http://www.usdebtclock.org/
http://www.physicsforums.com/showthread.php?t=33426
http://www.pmo.gov.ps/

creator: nick@webthing.com
text:
"some apache webservers" would indicate a local problem somewhere.

If you want to claim an apache bug, please produce a use case that demonstrates it.  That should help you find out what the error really is.
